SELECT TOP 25 A.EMP_NO, A.WORK_DT, ISNULL(E.PJT_NM,'-') AS PJT_CD, A.WORK_SPEC, ISNULL(D.LEVEL2_NM,'-') AS DEPT_CD, A.WORK_TIME, A.ETC_SPEC, ISNULL(C.LEVEL2_NM,'-') AS WORK_STEP, ISNULL(B.LEVEL2_NM,'-') AS JIKGUP_CD
FROM T_PM1020_BNT A, T_SC9100 B, T_SC9100 C, T_SC9100 D, T_SM3000_2016 E WHERE ((A.WORK_STEP *= C.LEVEL2_CD) AND (C.LEVEL1_CD='110' AND C.BUSI_GB = 'J')) AND((A.JIKGUP_CD *= B.LEVEL2_CD) AND (B.LEVEL1_CD='110' AND B.BUSI_GB = 'H')) AND((A.DEPT_CD *= D.LEVEL2_CD) AND (D.LEVEL1_CD='390' AND D.BUSI_GB='H')) AND((A.PJT_CD *= E.PJT_CD) AND(E.PJT_CD='13036' AND E.PJT_TYPE=''))

SELECT TOP 25 A.EMP_NO, A.WORK_DT, ISNULL(E.PJT_NM,'-') AS PJT_CD, A.WORK_SPEC, ISNULL(D.LEVEL2_NM,'-') AS DEPT_CD, A.WORK_TIME, A.ETC_SPEC, ISNULL(C.LEVEL2_NM,'-') AS WORK_STEP, ISNULL(B.LEVEL2_NM,'-') AS JIKGUP_CD
FROM T_PM1020_BNT A, T_SC9100 B, T_SC9100 C, T_SC9100 D, T_SM3000_2016 E WHERE ((A.WORK_STEP *= C.LEVEL2_CD) AND (C.LEVEL1_CD='110' AND C.BUSI_GB = 'J')) AND((A.JIKGUP_CD *= B.LEVEL2_CD) AND (B.LEVEL1_CD='110' AND B.BUSI_GB = 'H')) AND((A.DEPT_CD *= D.LEVEL2_CD) AND (D.LEVEL1_CD='390' AND D.BUSI_GB='H')) AND(A.PJT_CD *= E.PJT_CD) AND A.WORK_DT = #{WORK_DT};
